title.rendered: Apple AirPods with Wireless Charging Case

content.rendered:
Universal match that’s snug all day
Automatically on, routinely linked
Easy setup for all of your Apple gadgets
Quick entry to Siri by saying “Hey Siri”
Seamless switching between gadgets
The Wireless Charging Case delivers greater than 24 hours of battery life

excerpt.rendered:
Universal fit that’s comfortable all day
Automatically on, automatically connected
Easy setup for all your Apple devices
